Package rocks.bastion.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Assertions<M>
    Specifies assertions to apply to a response model received after performing a Bastion request.
    Callback<M>
    Performs an action after an API request has occurred and passed its assertions.
    HttpRequest
    Defines an HTTP request for Bastion to send as part of a test.
    Response
    Defines an HTTP response object containing a status code and associated status text.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiDataParameter
    Represents a data parameter which is used for application/x-www-form-urlencoded data.
    ApiHeader
    Simple data structure for holding a single instance of an HTTP response header.
    ApiProperty
    A simple data structure which contains a name-value pair for various attributes/properties in an HTTP request.
    ApiQueryParam
    Simple data structure for holding a single instance of an HTTP request query parameter.
    BastionBuilderImpl<MODEL>
    The standard implementation of the BastionBuilder.
    BastionFactory
    Creates and configures an instance of the BastionBuilderImpl fluent builder.
    BastionUtils
    An internal class containing utility functions which do not fit anywhere else.
    CommonRequestAttributes
    Contains the common attributes which usually appear in all HTTP requests.
    DefaultBastionFactory
    The default implementation of a BastionFactory which registers a basic set of model converters.
    FileRequest
    An HTTP request which takes any arbitrary file/resource, using the data within as its content body.
    FormUrlEncodedRequest
    A form URL-encoded data request for use during Bastion tests.
    GeneralRequest
    An HTTP request which takes any arbitrary text string as its content body.
    HttpMethod
    Represents an HTTP method that can be sent with HTTP requests.
    ModelResponse<MODEL>
    Represents an HTTP response which also has a response model object.
    RawResponse  
    RequestExecutor
    Responsible for executing a Bastion remote request built using the BastionBuilderImpl builder and prepare a response object.
    RouteParam
    Represents a key-value pair describing an assignment for a URL route parameter.
    StatusCodeAssertions
    Performs assertions on a response by checking for the HTTP status code.
    TemplateContentCompiler
    An internal class which uses a templating engine (JMustache in this case) to provide templating functionality for Bastion.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TemplateCompilationException
    Thrown when the TemplateContentCompiler could not compile the specified template.
